actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act to designate a segment of the Flathead River in Montana as a component of the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System, and for other purpose.

summary.text: Designates, under the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act, of a segment of the Flathead River in Montana as a component of the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act to designate a segment of the Flathead River in Montana as a component of the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System, and for other purpose.
